column.name: bz
column.annotate: 请填入相应的币种： 0A-折合人民币 0B-外币折人民币 0C-外币折美元 FF-非币种 01-人民币

column.name: sdbs
column.annotate: 请填入相应的时段标识： 1 时点 2 月日均 3 季日均 4 年日均 5 月累计 6 季累计 7 年累计 8 月平

attribute.value: select zb.zbdh as key, zb.zbmc as value from khdx_zb zb inner join khdx_zbtjkj zbtjkj on zbtjkj.zbdh=zb.zbdh and tjkj=2 where zb.whfs='2' order by zb.zbpx

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hysgzbdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'统计日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.tjrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hysgzbdr_temp t set t.error= t.error||'行员代号检查不通过,没有权限!' where not exists(select 1 from table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx where qx.hydh=t.hydh) and t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hysgzbdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'指标代号不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from khdx_zb zb where rtrim(t.zbdh)=rtrim(cast(zb.zbdh as char(250)))) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hysgzbdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'指标值输入错误，只能输入:17位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zbz)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.zbz,17,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hysgzbdr_temp t set error=error||'行员代号和名称必须一致!' where not exists ( select 1 from khdx_hy hy where t.hydh=hy.hydh and hy.hymc=t.hymc) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hysgzbdr_temp t set error=error||'该指标不存在此币种!' where not exists ( select 1 from khdx_zbbz where zbdh = cast(t.zbdh as integer ) and bz = t.bz) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hysgzbdr_temp t set error=error||'该指标不存在此时段!' where not exists ( select 1 from khdx_zbsd where zbdh = cast(t.zbdh as integer ) and sdbs = t.sdbs) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hysgzbdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from YJZB_HYSGZB tar ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.zbdh as DECIMAL(22,0))=tar.ZBDH and t.hydh=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.bz =tar.BZ and t.sdbs =tar.SDBS and cast(t.tjrq as DECIMAL(22,0))=tar.TJRQ and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hysgzbdr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select zbdh,hydh,bz,sdbs,tjrq from hysgzbdr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by zbdh,hydh,bz,sdbs,tjrq having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.zbdh=dr.zbdh and t.hydh=dr.hydh and t.bz=dr.bz and t.sdbs=dr.sdbs and t.tjrq=dr.tjrq) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE hysgzbdr_temp ( tjrq varchar(100) , hydh varchar(100) , hymc varchar(100) , zbdh varchar(100) , zbmc varchar(100) , bz varchar(100) , sdbs varchar(100) , zbz varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hysgzbdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hysgzbdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,zbdh,zbmc,bz,sdbs,zbz,khdxdh,error from hysgzbdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,zbdh,zbmc,bz,sdbs,zbz,khdxdh,error from hysgzbdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,zbdh,zbmc,bz,sdbs,zbz,khdxdh,error from hysgzbdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into YJZB_HYSGZB(ZBDH,KHDXDH,BZ,SDBS,TJRQ,ZBZ) select cast (t.zbdh as DECIMAL(22,0)),KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH, t.bz , t.sdbs ,cast (t.tjrq as DECIMAL(22,0)),cast (t.zbz as DECIMAL(19,2)) from hysgzbdr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and KHDX_HY0.HYDH=cast (t.hydh as VARCHAR(20))
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from YJZB_HYSGZB tar where exists(select 1 from hysgzbdr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.zbdh as DECIMAL(22,0))=tar.ZBDH and t.hydh=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.bz=tar.BZ and t.sdbs=tar.SDBS and cast(t.tjrq as DECIMAL(22,0))=tar.TJRQ and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $tjrq$ tjrq,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,zb.zbdh,zb.zbmc,zbbz.bz,zbsd.sdbs,cast(coalesce(sgzb.zbz,0) as decimal(24,2)) zbz from table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qx inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) inner join khdx_zb zb on 1=1 and zb.zbdh=$zbdh$ inner join khdx_zbbz zbbz on zbbz.zbdh=zb.zbdh inner join khdx_zbsd zbsd on zbsd.zbdh=zb.zbdh left join yjzb_hysgzb sgzb on sgzb.zbdh=zb.zbdh and sgzb.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh and zbbz.bz=sgzb.bz and sgzb.sdbs=zbsd.sdbs and sgzb.tjrq=$tjrq$ order by zbbz.bz,zbsd.sdbs,hy.hydh
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select zb.zbdh as key, zb.zbmc as value from khdx_zb zb inner join khdx_zbtjkj zbtjkj on zbtjkj.zbdh=zb.zbdh and tjkj=2 where zb.whfs='2' order by zb.zbpx
